thread.title: Becky's Fund and Trustify Announce Partnership Providing Pro-Bono Services to Survivors of Domestic Violence
thread.title_full: Becky's Fund and Trustify Announce Partnership Providing Pro-Bono Services to Survivors of Domestic Violence - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Becky's Fund and Trustify Announce Partnership Providing Pro-Bono Services to Survivors of Domestic Violence
text:
Trustify
- Pro-bono safety services for domestic violence survivors
- Becky's Fund to serve as advisor on domestic violence cases
- Nationwide access to over 2,000 experienced, licensed investigators
WASHINGTON , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Trustify, the world's first technology platform for connecting consumers with affordable, licensed private investigators announced a partnership today with Becky's Fund, a leading non-profit of domestic violence survivor support services, with pro-bono investigation and safety services .
Becky Lee, Executive Director of Becky's Fund, and her team will be providing Trustify staff and investigators with training and guidance for handling domestic violence cases. Becky's Fund's expertise provides important insight for Trustify investigators, as domestic violence cases require a special awareness of specific survivor concerns. Trustify is proud to partner with Becky's Fund as a sponsor for Walk This Way , an annual event benefitting the Men of CODE program. Trustify will also be donating hours of investigator services to Becky's Fund in support of survivor needs.
"This partnership will make a big difference for survivors of domestic violence, who are often vulnerable and afraid when they approach us for help," says Lee, who has dedicated her career to addressing the social, cultural, and legal barriers that entrap domestic violence survivors. "Domestic Violence Month is the best time to raise awareness about these issues. We dedicate this time every year to call attention to the powerlessness of being a victim of domestic violence. We're thrilled to be working with Trustify to help empower these survivors with the help they need."
"We are passionate about incorporating social responsibility into our corporate culture," said Danny Boice , CEO of Trustify. "I founded Trustify to make it easier and more affordable to ensure safety and a sound peace of mind to those most in need. My team and I believe it's important to give back to our community and we are proud to donate private investigator hours to Becky's Fund."
Since its launch, Trustify has helped consumers in thousands of cases ranging from locating missing persons, birth parent reunification, custody enforcement, infidelity and cheating spouses, insurance fraud, and forensic investigations of finances.
For all media inquiries regarding Trustify's partnership with Becky's Fund, please contact Howard J. Lee at howard@beckysfund.org , 202-730-1301. More information on the Trustify's corporate social responsibility program can be found by visiting http://www.trustify.info/good .
TRUSTIFY is the first technology platform designed to connect consumers to on-demand private investigator services. With a network of over 2,000 private investigators, Trustify enables you quickly hire an investigator in small and affordable blocks of time, providing trust and safety across the digital and physical world. For more information visit www.trustify.info .
BECKY'S FUND is a nonprofit organization committed to the prevention of domestic and dating violence by creating awareness, encouraging advocacy among peers, promoting activism through outreach programs, and providing support for survivors. For more information visit www.beckysfund.org .
Media Contact: Carthryn Marcus, cathryn@trustify.info
Howard J. Lee , howard@beckysfund.org , 202-730-1301.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151006/274660LOGO
